snippet: In northeast Lebanon, at least two people, including an 8-year-old boy, died and 10 were wounded, according to officials.
abstract: Shells fired from Syria kill at least two Lebanese civilians and wound 10 others, in the latest instance of violence spilling across the border; continuing bloodshed in Syria has raised fears that the unrest will cross into Lebanon, which has extensive sectarian and political ties to its eastern neighbor.
lead_paragraph: In northeast Lebanon, at least two people, including an 8-year-old boy, died and 10 were wounded, according to officials.

headline.seo: Lebanese Civilians Killed by Shells Fired From Syria
headline.main: Shells Fired From Syria Kill Lebanese
headline.print_headline: Shells Fired From Syria Kill Lebanese

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
